HomePage.title: Build fantastic visual novel with your favorite JS Frameworks
HomePage.subtitle: Pixi’VN is a very versatile and powerful 2D game engine. It is based on JavaScript/TypeScript and PixiJS.

Introduction.create_it_description: Initialize a new game with a command.
Introduction.write_description: Write your story in your favorite narrative language.
Introduction.ship_description: Deploy your game easily with hosting platforms and video game platforms.

Architecture.title: More levels.
Architecture.subtitle: 2D rendering is completely based on PixiJS and Pixi’VN components. You can add more PixiJS or HTML (React Vue ...) layers to create an innovative UI.

Highlights.light_subtitle: Deals with specific features, giving the possibility to add more with other libraries.
Highlights.flexible_subtitle: Usable in any JS project for various purposes.
Highlights.smart_subtitle: Use the most innovative technologies without reinventing what already exists.

Contributing.title: Made Possible by You.
Contributing.subtitle: Pixi’VN is 100% powered by passion and open source community.
